knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment="#>", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)
X <- as.matrix(mtcars[, c("disp","hp","drat")])
Y <- as.matrix(mtcars[, c("qsec","mpg")])
cc <- cancor(X, Y)
cc$cor
